question: 及第
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: I <kanji>reach</kanji>ed the <kanji>ordinal prefix number</kanji> that represents a passing score on my test. This means I was able to <vocabulary>make the grade</vocabulary> and have a status of <vocabulary>passing an exam</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
